scenarios.starting_prompt: I want to open a coffee shop. Compare Indiranagar, Koramangala, and HSR Layout in Bangalore simultaneously.
scenarios.conversation_plan: Request a side-by-side comparison of the three neighborhoods. After the initial analysis, press the agent to declare a clear winner based on foot traffic.

scenarios.starting_prompt: I want to open a shop.
scenarios.conversation_plan: Start with a vague request to open a shop. Let the agent lead the intake process, providing 'Coffee Shop' and 'Seattle' only when asked.
